headline: 3 Reasons INCY is Risky and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the past six months, Incyte’s shares (currently trading at $60.02) have posted a disappointing 11.8% loss while the S&P 500 was down 1.7%. This was partly driven by its softer quarterly results and might have investors contemplating their next move.
